DataElement.preferredName: Observation Reuse Template Study Activity Subcategory Code OMOP CDM Note Type Concept Identifier
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Watching something and taking note of what happens.:To use again.:Something that establishes or serves as a pattern for reference; a form, mold, or pattern used as a guide to making something.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective._A subdivision that has common differentiating characteristics within a larger category.:A symbol or combination of symbols which is given an arbitrary meaning within a systematized collection of concepts used for data representation._A foreign key to the predefined Concept in the Standardized Vocabularies reflecting the type, origin or provenance of the Note.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Watching something and taking note of what happens.:To use again.:Something that establishes or serves as a pattern for reference; a form, mold, or pattern used as a guide to making something.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective.

Concepts.definition: Watching something and taking note of what happens.
Something that establishes or serves as a pattern for reference; a form, mold, or pattern used as a guide to making something.
A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

Property.preferredDefinition: A subdivision that has common differentiating characteristics within a larger category.:A symbol or combination of symbols which is given an arbitrary meaning within a systematized collection of concepts used for data representation.

Concepts.definition: A subdivision that has common differentiating characteristics within a larger category.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ValueDomain.preferredName: OMOP CDM Note Type Concept Identifier
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A foreign key to the predefined Concept in the Standardized Vocabularies reflecting the type, origin or provenance of the Note.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An organizational header for concepts representing mostly abstract entities.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

Concepts.definition: One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.
